title: Person of Interest Season 2 Intro [HD]
author: stillcoldwind
comment:
Michael Emerson's voice is so awesome. [0:21] "We don't" was perfect.
Though I agree that The First Season Intro was better due to more depth, thus creating a slightly longer introduction. 
Well, like you don't judge a Book by it's Cover, you also don't judge a TV Series by it's Intro. Such an amazing show.
2019, and this thing is now real.

Disagree. I much prefer season 2's intro, especially the way it shuffles through the images of all the characters as Finch is explaining what they do. I think that at this point in the series, there's no need to mention that Finch built the machine because they make the fact clear in almost every episode.
i honestly love both seasons. baby blues was my favorite episode.
J'adore cette serie... tres bonne saison et à présent la saison 2.... yes!!! Arold you are the best ;-)
description: You are being watched. New hit show Person of Interest's second season title sequence theme. All the copyrights belongs to CBS.
